entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
